Hello!

Since 2004 I have professional experience in web design and programming. I also give classes, lectures, conferences, seminars, courses and training for different companies, educational institutions and communities on the Internet.

I'm a fan of CSS and JavaScript, Batman and Flash, good coffee and dogs, I have one a little bit angry, called Kenai.

Irma, my wife, is the CSS of my HTML ( ).

Bryan, my inspiration.

I'm faithful believer of two phrases:

  1. "Mens sana in corpore sano"
  2. "Less is always more"

I enjoy running marathons, cycling, exercising and dancing salsa.

To know more visit jonmircha.com

Do you want to learn of the wonderful world of the web? visit bextlan.com
